item.title: 土耳其房地产投资者首次公开募股将募集 1.41 亿美元资金
item.description: 土耳其商业房地产开发商 Ronesans Gayrimenkul 将在首次公开募股中出售股票，这是伊斯坦布尔今年迄今为止规模最大的一次。【原文：Turkish commercial real estate developer Ronesans Gayrimenkul will sell shares in an initial public offering, the biggest in Istanbul so far this year.】

item.title: 伊朗报复恐惧、卡什卡利警告引发新兴市场资产大跌
item.description: 中东紧张局势导致油价飙升，重新引发了对通货膨胀的担忧，一位美联储官员也对美国央行能否在今年降息表示怀疑，新兴市场股市因此下跌。【原文：Emerging-market equities fell as an oil-price spike driven by Middle East tensions brought back inflation concerns and a Federal Reserve official raised doubts whether the US central bank can cut interest rates this year.】

item.title: 英国最大基金押注市场误解日本央行加息
item.description: 法律与通用投资管理公司（Legal & General Investment Management）押注日本央行的政策行动将低于市场预期。【原文：Legal & General Investment Management is betting policy action from the Bank of Japan will fall short of market expectations.】

item.title: 油价突破 90 美元，欧佩克+面临繁荣与萧条重演的风险
item.description: 欧佩克+"联盟可能正冒着重蹈去年石油市场繁荣与萧条覆辙的风险。【原文：The OPEC+ alliance may be risking a repeat of last year’s oil market boom and bust.】

item.title: 裕信银行聘请汇丰银行资深交易员科达（Coda）主管并购和行业业务
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）聘请汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的安德烈亚-科达（Andrea Coda）担任并购部门主管，这是意大利第二大银行加强咨询和融资解决方案业务的举措之一。【原文：UniCredit SpA hired HSBC Holdings Plc’s Andrea Coda to head its merger and acquisitions division, part of a push by Italy’s second-largest bank to strengthen its advisory and financing solutions business.】

item.title: 印度央行称部分用户 "滥用 "印度货币衍生品规则
item.description: 印度央行表示，它将坚持要求交易所交易货币衍生品市场参与者拥有实际风险敞口，一些参与者正在滥用这一机制。【原文：India’s central bank said it will stick to its requirement for participants in the exchange-traded currency derivatives market to have an actual exposure, and that some players were misusing the facility.】

item.title: 非洲最大的独立电池项目赢得优先投标
item.description: 据 Globeleq Inc. 报道，南非已选定一个耗资 3 亿美元的独立电池项目，这将是非洲大陆同类项目中最大的一个，以促进其能源供应。【原文：South Africa has picked a $300-million standalone battery project that will be the biggest of its kind on the continent to boost its energy supply, according to Globeleq Inc.】

item.title: 拉胡尔-甘地押注印度市场创纪录的反弹使他更加富有
item.description: 印度反对党领袖拉胡尔-甘地（Rahul Gandhi）的财富在过去五年中增长超过 28%，这得益于他在印度股市牛市中的股票投资。【原文：Indian opposition leader Rahul Gandhi’s wealth rose more than 28% in the past five years, aided by his stock investments amid a bull run in Indian equities.】

item.title: 美国银行称，美联储开始缩减货币政策一年后，"抢钱潮 "将逆转
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师说，历史表明，在美联储开始降息一年后，投资者才会开始赎回现金基金。【原文：Investors are still flocking to cash funds, and Bank of America Corp. strategists say history suggests redemptions won’t begin until a year after the Federal Reserve starts cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 欧洲央行新框架工具或将在 15 个月后出台
item.description: 根据彭博社对经济学家的调查，欧洲中央银行可能只需 15 个月就能推出新的长期贷款和永久性债券组合，以确保欧元区经济有足够的资金。【原文：The European Central Bank may only be 15 months away from introducing new longer-term loans and a permanent bond portfolio to ensure the euro-area economy is sufficiently funded, according to a Bloomberg survey of economists.】

item.title: 石油引擎盖下的信号显示市场非常看涨
item.description: 全球石油市场在短短几周内从萎靡不振变得生机勃勃，布伦特期货价格一举突破每桶 90 美元的关键门槛，关键指标也不断闪现出更多看涨信号。【原文：The global oil market has gone from languid to lively in the space of a few weeks, with Brent futures blowing past the key $90-a-barrel threshold as critical gauges flash steadily more bullish signals.】

item.title: 岸田承诺对日元过度波动采取适当行动
item.description: 日本首相岸田文雄（Fumio Kishida）再次对日元汇率下滑发出警告，承诺在不排除任何选择的情况下采取适当行动应对过度举动。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida repeated his warnings against the yen’s slide, pledging to act appropriately against excessive moves without excluding any options.】

item.title: Trafigura 两名高管将因重大调整离职
item.description: 作为世界顶级大宗商品贸易商之一，特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）的两名最高级管理人员即将离职，公司业务发生重大调整。【原文：Two of Trafigura Group’s most senior executives are leaving the company, in a major shake-up at one of the world’s top commodity traders.】

item.title: 印度航空公司飞行员与 Vistara 航空公司机组人员共同表达对疲劳和薪酬的担忧
item.description: 塔塔集团旗下另一家航空公司的飞行员与维斯塔拉航空公司的机组人员一样，表达了对工作过度和工资过低的担忧，这有可能延长本周困扰印度的旅行混乱局面。【原文：Pilots at another Tata Group-owned airline joined crew at Vistara in voicing concerns about being overworked and underpaid, threatening to prolong the travel chaos that’s plagued India this week.】

item.title: 意大利电信签署 15 亿欧元过桥贷款用于再融资
item.description: 意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）签署了一笔 15 亿欧元（16 亿美元）的过桥贷款，以满足其再融资需求，直至其完成网络出售。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA has signed a €1.5 billion ($1.6 billion) bridge loan to cover its refinancing needs until it closes the sale of its network.】

item.title: 据说阿布扎比第一银行将把目光投向土耳其以推进海外发展
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿布扎比第一银行（First Abu Dhabi Bank PJSC）正在研究土耳其的潜在收购目标，其中包括 Yapi Ve Kredi Bankasi AS，这也是这家阿联酋银行在海外寻找发展机会的一部分。【原文：First Abu Dhabi Bank PJSC is studying potential acquisition targets in Turkey, including Yapi Ve Kredi Bankasi AS, as part of the Emirati lender’s hunt for growth opportunities overseas, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 壳牌天然气贸易第一季度业绩疲软
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）表示，其第一季度天然气贸易盈利有所下降，但与历史标准相比仍然很高。【原文：Shell Plc said its earnings from gas trading dropped in the first quarter, but remain high by historical standards.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的 Zentner 称，美联储将在 6 月前准备好削减货币政策
item.description: 摩根士丹利首席美国经济学家 Ellen Zentner 表示，美国联邦储备委员会有望在 6 月份降息。【原文：The US Federal Reserve is on track to cut interest rates in June, according to Ellen Zentner, chief US economist at Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 高昂的保险费是影响中国电动汽车市场的最新因素
item.description: 近几个月来，中国的电动汽车需求放缓，一些驾驶员发现自己需要支付更多的保险费，并在社交媒体上抱怨这一事实。【原文：In another setback for electric car demand in China, where uptake has slowed in recent months, some drivers are now finding themselves paying more for insurance — and are taking to social media to complain about the fact.】

item.title: 抗议与价格推动欧洲重塑绿色协议
item.description: 2019 年底，欧盟启动了 "绿色协议"，旨在引领世界走向可持续发展的未来。紧接着，科维德事件、通胀飙升、供应链断裂和俄罗斯入侵乌克兰接踵而至。【原文：In late 2019, the European Union kicked off its Green Deal with the aim of leading the world into a sustainable future. Then came Covid, surging inflation, broken supply chains and Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 通胀风险持续存在，印度央行维持关键利率不变
item.description: 印度中央银行在连续第七次政策会议上维持基准利率不变，因为热浪即将来临的警告再次引发了对通货膨胀飙升的担忧。【原文：India’s central bank left its benchmark interest rate unchanged for a seventh straight policy meeting as warnings of a coming heat wave renewed fears of an inflation spike.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁如何摆脱数十亿美元债务的定时炸弹
item.description: 二月中旬，一些投资者开始抢购阿斯顿-马丁公司的股票。他们高兴的并不是阿斯顿-马丁持续亏损的业务出现转机，而是确认这家詹姆斯-邦德最喜爱的汽车制造商正在与银行家谈判解决债务问题。有一段时间，这家英国公司和全球其他在资金便宜时借贷的垃圾级公司似乎注定要撞上所谓的 "到期墙"，这一事件将推高阿斯顿-马丁的股价。【原文：In mid-February, some investors started their day snapping up the shares of Aston Martin. It wasn’t some turnaround in its consistently loss-making operations that they were cheerful about but confirmation that James Bond’s favorite carmaker was negotiating with bankers to address its debt. For a while, the British firm — and other junk-rated companies around the globe that borrowed when money was cheap — had seemed destined to hit a so-called maturity wall, an event that would drive up its inte】

item.title: BE称美国就业报告将显示招聘步伐放缓
欧洲央行有望从 6 月起每季度降息一次
item.description: 据彭博社调查的经济学家称，欧洲央行将于 6 月份开始稳定但渐进的降息之路，至少将持续到明年年底。【原文：The European Central Bank will embark in June on a steady-yet-gradual path of interest-rate cuts that’ll run at least through the end of next year, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 全球供应风险支撑铜价，铜价接近 14 个月高点
item.description: 由于投资者对全球矿石供应和中国冶炼厂可能减产的担忧加剧，铜价接近去年 1 月以来的最高水平。【原文：Copper traded near the highest level since January last year as investors weighed mounting concerns over global ore supply and potential production cuts from Chinese smelters.】

item.title: 日元创两周新高，因猜测日本央行将提前加息
item.description: 据报道，日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）的讲话刺激了人们对日本央行将在今年早些时候而不是晚些时候再次加息的猜测，日元兑美元汇率攀升至两周高点。【原文：The yen climbed to a two-week high against the dollar after reported remarks from Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda boosted speculation the central bank will deliver an additional interest-rate increase sooner rather than later this year.】

item.title: 日本国内经济放缓，优衣库老板看到海外市场的支持
